About Our Company


Hobson Electric has been Montgomery County's most trusted provider of electrical services for nearly two decades. Our customers know that they can rely on us to deliver efficient, quality workmanship on every project. Contact us today for a free estimate!

Service Area

Based in the heart of downtown Crawfordsville, we serve Montgomery County and the surrounding area. Our service area includes Montgomery, Tippecanoe, Clinton, Boone, Hendricks, Putnam, Parke, Warren, and Fountain Counties.
